comment.author: 80878055@N00
comment._content: Based in Milford village near Armagh

comment.author: 61364329@N03
comment._content: It is so interesting to see so many women in the design studio.  So many in fact, that I wonder if they are just colouring in or hatching something, rather than doing design work?  If there are a lot of women, you just know they aren't being paid much.
